ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
4 Cameras, 2 x1/3" Effio CCD Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance and 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD, 700 TV lines, Vari-Focal 4~9mm manual lens
4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
